scripts.build:chrome: node build.js chrome && cd dist && zip -r vt-extension *
scripts.build:firefox: node build.js firefox && cd dist && zip -r vt-extension *
scripts.dev:chrome: nodemon --watch src --watch build.js --ext js,ts,json,css,html --polling --exec 'npm run build:chrome --dev && node ./scripts/chrome.js chromium'
